get_cache_threshold.title: Get Request Cache Threshold
get_cache_threshold.description: The amount of time to cache the get response. Get requests will use the cached response until this threshold has been passed, then it will get a new response.

get_delay.title: Get Request Delay
get_delay.description: The amount of time to delay in between get requests. This is used to prevent Homebridge from flooding the Aqua Connect bridge.

set_delay.title: Set Request Delay
set_delay.description: The amount of time to delay in between set requests. The Aqua Connect bridge will not respond to requests that are to close together.

include_accessories.title: Include Accessories
include_accessories.description: Select the accessories that you want to use.
